# Quick Prompt
> Quick Prompt is a VS Code extension for managing and reusing prompts for AI assistants (ChatGPT, Copilot, Claude, Gemini) with AI-powered title generation, smart tracking, and workspace isolation.

Streamline your AI-assisted coding workflow by integrating a prompt library with clipboard tracking directly in VS Code.

## Documentation
- [README](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/winterdrive/QuickPrompt/master/README.md): Key features, installation, and basic operations.
- [Development Guide](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/winterdrive/QuickPrompt/master/DEVELOPMENT.md): Setup, architecture, and module structure.
- [Full Context Documentation](https://winterdrive.github.io/QuickPrompt/llms-full.txt): A single file containing the full text of all critical documentation.
